page.title: 08Village Activities-Children
page.content: Some children in our area go to {Cubs}or{Brownies}and one person goes to{Scouts. } In Brownies girls are able to work for badges.They may sew them on to their uniform. For boys, there is Cubs which is similar to Brownies. Brownies and Cubs meet at the Village Hall. Several children sing in the{church {choir,}but{ballet classes, swimming, and St. John's Ambulance{First Aid {classes}are held outside Cressage. Lots of people play musical instruments and take private lessons. Sometimes they have other lessons in school in{playing violins,recorders, and{guitars.} As for sporting activities, children go{horse riding,}learn{judo,}some play for Cressage Eagles{Football Club, while others have joined the Wenlock Olympian{Athletic Club. }
